text.text: Manolis Alivizatos, CEO of BrainBlocks, offers two decades of cross-sector tech expertise, from defense to health, and a patented data processing thesis. His leadership fuses technical savvy with entrepreneurial vision.
Georgios Douzas, CTO at BrainBlocks, applies his physics acumen to spearhead AI advancements, leveraging over a decade of tech development to propel BrainBlocks' technological drive.
Fernando Bação, professor at NOVA IMS and BrainBlocks' Chief Scientific Officer, infuses our AI initiatives with his academic prowess in analytics and information systems management.

Steven Katevatis, with extensive legal expertise and a passion for tech innovation, serves as BrainBlocks' Chief Strategy Officer, guiding strategic decisions and legal frameworks for our pioneering tech solutions.

Nikolas Sgantzis, a forensic geneticist with a Ph.D. in Life Sciences, enhances BrainBlocks' life science applications through his expertise in DNA analysis and bioinformatics. His blend of academic and practical experience adds valuable insights to our team.
